title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 15 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 15 2022
description:
Republican Mayra Flores wins special election victory in Democrat Texas district in major sign of a Red Tsunami coming in November. Clay says, "We're talking about seats that nobody even considered being in play. Maybe the biggest Red Wave of all time potentially on the horizon." Biden administration to punish border control agents who were CLEARED of accusations they whipped migrants. The View endorses Kamala/Pete ticket to beat Trump or "DeathSantis." This Friday Clay and Buck's dads will join the show for Father's Day. Call (212) 445-3969 NOW and leave your questions for the dads. Democrats can't win a contest of ideas, so they cling to identity politics.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
